title: 5 Bedroom Luxurious Home
posting_body: All brick home on georgous lot.
Custom built brick home in rarely available St Charles subdivision, Red Gate Ridge.
School district 303.
The living room opens into the dining room with a slight separation allowing in an abundance of natural light and you can enjoy a cross breeze through the many windows.
Both rooms boast crown molding, the dining room is accented with a chair rail and tray ceiling.
Is the kitchen the heart of your home?
This one is a dream!
All stainless steel KitchenAid appliances.
Double oven, built in cooktop, granite counter tops and newly refinished solid wood cabinetry.
Lots of counter space; a center island provides even more work space, storage space and breakfast bar.
If that's not enough, check out the walk-in pantry.
Beyond the breakfast island there is still room for a dinette table to enjoy the view out to the expansive yard.
Enter the family room through an expansive doorway to a vaulted cedar ceiling, recessed lighting, immense windows and a solid brick fireplace with gas logs.
The home has hardwood flooring and custom shades throughout.
Close yourself into your new office for privacy with french doors off the foyer.
Who isn't looking for that extra space...light & sunny with good views & fresh air.
Newly remodeled bathrooms and a Master en-suite to die for!
Fabulous details in the tray ceiling.
Enjoy the sitting area with sky light.
Walk in closet.
Decedent luxury in the bath: heated floor, standing tub, in wall electric fire place, dual vanity sink/cab/mirrors.
And we can't say enough about the shower!
Very spacious with TWO shower head systems!
The perfect solution to relax after a tough day.
Bring your entertaining spirit here, over an acre for anything you can think of.
Brick paver patio with built in grill.
Brick outdoor fireplace for any evening.
Want to bring the party inside?
No problem!
The finished basement has a wet bar with wine cooler with loads of room to mingle.
Full bathroom and a fifth bedroom for any overnight guests.
Laundry room off the garage is completely remodeled with new washer/dryer.
Have a fine time collecting clothes from the laundry shoot instead of carrying heavy baskets down the stairs.
Three car garage has sealed epoxy flooring, lots of storage or work space.
